column1: Born in Rockingham, NC to Dr. Frederick R Klenner and Annie Hill Klenner. He was the
Begins to obsess over his father’s acceptance which included shared interests in Hitler,
firearms, German history, military propaganda, military clothing, demons, and the KKK.
In high school, he joined Demolay (a teenage version of Masons). He was a member of
1966-1968 14-16 French, Latin, and the library club. He was an audio visual assistant in the library. He
played the cornet in concert band.
After his junior year of high school his father switched him from his public high school to
a private school in Georgia, Woodward Academy, to escape racial integration.
At Woodward Academy, Fritz joined the rifle team and club, pep club, and band. He took
first place in the science fair.
Spring 1970 17 Graduated from high school, Woodland Academy, ninth in his class of 138.
Fall 1970 17 Was accepted to the University of Mississippi and began classes.
Entered summer school to finish his required credits but dropped out and never finished
1974-1977 21-24 Worked as an unlicensed assistant in his father’s clinic.
Left Georgia for Durham, NC, where he supposedly was enrolled in Duke Medical
Became engaged to Ruth Dupree. He cancelled the engagement saying his father had
Claimed his father’s vitamin treatments had cured him of cancer and the wedding was
12/23/1978 26 Got married to Ruth Dupree in Greensboro, NC.
Tom Lynch and Susie Newsom Lynch (Fritz’s first cousin) got divorced. Sparked child
09/1979 27 custody dispute between the two parents. This caused Susie to move back to North
Carolina where she regained contact with Fritz.
Fall 1979-Spring Met Cynthia Phillips, his friend’s wife, and confessed his love to her. He was also seeing
1981 several other women and having multiple affairs. His wife, Ruth, found out.

column3: While working as an unlicensed assistant in his father’s clinic, he diagnosed Susie, hisfirst cousin, with multiple sclerosis and his dad backed up the diagnosis.
Dr. Klenner died and left $25,000 of his life insurance policy to Fritz.
Spent most of the life insurance policy money on weapons and military paraphernalia.
Shot Delores Lynch (WF, 68) and Jane Lynch (WF, 39) to death in Prospect, Kentucky.He killed them at their home.
Robert Newsom told Susie Newsom Lynch that he was going to be testifying on Tom’sbehalf in the child custody trial.
Shot Robert Newsom (WM, 65) to death. Stabbed and shot Florence Newsom (WF, 63) todeath. Shot Hattie Newsom (WF, 85) to death.  They were killed at Hattie’s home inWinston-Salem, NC.
Confessed to the first two murders to his friend who was wire tapped by the police.

John Lynch (WM, 10) and James Lynch (WM, 9) were poisoned with cyanide and shot.Susie Newsom Lynch (WF, 39) and Fritz Klenner (WM, 32) died in a suicide car bomb inGreensboro, NC with John and James Lynch in the Chevy Blazer.
